content: Golden Lining is one of the Transformation Spells in Black Myth: Wukong. With it activated, you can transform into Yellow Loong, gaining immunity to Shock and the ability to see through the enemy. Each attack also inflicts Thunder Bane. Any Focus built up before transformation can be converted for use afterwards.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Lining.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Lining'.
The content is as follows:
Golden Lining is one of the Transformation Spells in Black Myth: Wukong. With it activated, you can transform into Yellow Loong, gaining immunity to Shock and the ability to see through the enemy. Each attack also inflicts Thunder Bane. Any Focus built up before transformation can be converted for use afterwards.
